titles.title: Theres Gonna Be A Revival In The Land

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's gonna be a revival in the land
There's gonna be a revival in the land
From the north, to the south
Fron the east and the west
There's gonna be a revival in the land

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Outro
There's gonna be a revival
There's gonna be a revival
There's gonna be a revival in the land
